page.title: 15EVENTS
page.content: Every June,Law has a Gala Day.The Queen and her court are chosen from Law Primary School.The court consists of a Page,3 Maids and a Champion.Every Gala Day we have fancy dress contests, on floats and on foot,led by a Pipe Band.There is also a Majorette parade. When the fancy dress competitors have paraded around Law there is a fair. There are also stalls where they sell books and food.There are competitions like "Beat the Goalie" and side shows where you have to knock down coconuts with a ball,or throw a ball into a bucket.There is a boxing competition and a dancing display.There are races for adults and children and medals are awarded to the winners.Small children can ride on a Shetland pony.In the evening there is a Gala Day Dance.The Queen and her court are invited to this.
